sanskrit_verse: यो यावद्निह्नुवीतार्थं मिथ्या यावति वा वदेत् । तौ नृपेण ह्यधर्मज्ञौ दाप्यौ तद्द्विगुणं दमम् ॥ ८.५९॥
transliteration: yo yāvad-nihnuvītārthaṁ mithyā yāvati vā vadet | tau nṛpeṇa hy-adharmajñau dāpyau tad-dvi-guṇaṁ damam || 8.59 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who conceals a fact relevant to a case or speaks falsely in support of a falsehood shall incur a penalty double the value of the matter at stake, as determined by the sovereign.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority resides in the sovereign to restore truth when obscured
Causation is established through intentional misrepresentation or omission
Capacity-based responsibility is invoked where awareness and intent co-arise
Restoration logic demands proportional correction aligned with energetic distortion caused
Consciousness alignment requires reintegration through corrective completion, not punitive suffering
executable_legal_axioms: IF an agent knowingly omits material information OR asserts false data THEN assign liability equal to twice the quantifiable stake involved
IF intent and capacity are confirmed via pramāṇa THEN initiate restorative protocol而非 punitive enforcement
IF misrepresentation distorts adjudicative integrity THEN compute restitution using proportional doubling mechanism
IF agent demonstrates readiness for alignment THEN activate consciousness-reintegrative completion process
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this axiom establishes that deliberate falsification or concealment constitutes a breach of dharma-based legal integrity. The doubled penalty serves not as punishment but as energetic recalibration, restoring balance disrupted by conscious deviation.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa confirms causal sequence: concealment → distortion → imbalance. Penalty functions as restitution, not vengeance. Responsibility aligns proportionally to capacity and awareness. Truth restoration supersedes punitive frameworks.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Completion Process: Require full disclosure and public correction of falsehood
Activate Consciousness Reintegration: Facilitate alignment through guided reflective practice
Assign Energetic Restoration Duty: Mandate service proportional to distortion caused
Verify Readiness for Re-entry: Confirm integrity reestablished before legal status reinstated
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source of all Dharma. Misalignment corrected. Truth restored. Consciousness affirmed as ultimate judge.
